column4: Amaranth; thanks for the great work.. keep it up.. ubuntu would be lost without your repos
Ah, those. You should really upgrade to gutsy :)
Nope, the packages in gutsy are newer than the ones in my repo. My repo was a backport of the stuff we were doing in gutsy and I stopped updating it around the time of gutsy beta.
If you have gutsy-backports enabled you'll also get a version even better than was in gutsy release :)
